result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Theft of Mail (less than 10 pieces of mail)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Zachary M. Borges

records.addlTxt: Includes cases 22CM1043 & 22CM1044. No contact with victim(s): T.S.B., N.B.J., J.K., M.R.K., K.M.K. or residence. No contact with victim(s) West Side Tasty Treats or owners.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. No possession or use of dangerous weapons. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 2supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Amanda.
Cases called at 2:23 pm.
INCLUDES: 22CM1043 and 22CM1044. 

State appears by ADA Lacey Coonen. Defendant appears from MCJ, with Attorney Greg Venturini.
Date and Time set for IA; VRCW. 

Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 

PLEA: NOT GUILTY. 

COURT ORDERS: $1,000 cash bond - CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s):  T.S.B., N.B.J., J.K., M.R.K., K.M.K. or residence.  No contact with victim(s):  West Side Tasty Treats or owners.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
- Absolute sobriety from, and no possession of controlled substances, except prescriptions taken as prescribed. 
- No possession or use of dangerous weapons. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 2 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
